channel.title: Having Problems
channel.description:
I'm having problems with adding bankitems in rscd.php file in wamp.
Whenever I add the code to define it it just gives an error.
Inventory Items are perfect but Bank Items is a different story.
Where should i add bank items code, under rscd_invitems?
Could anyone please repost the code. I need help on adding it in :)

item.title: Having Problems

item.description:
@elyad wrote:

no problem mate

Read full topic

item.title: Having Problems
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

$db->query('INSERT INTO '.$db->prefix.'rscd_curstats(`user`) VALUES(\''.$db->escape($username_hash).'\')') or error('Unable to fill curstats', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error()); $db->query('INSERT INTO '.$db->prefix.'rscd_experience(`user`) VALUES(\''.$db->escape($username_hash).'\')') or error('Unable to fill experience', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error()); $db->query('INSERT INTO '.$db->prefix.'rscd_players(`user`, `username`, `owner`, `pass`, `creation_date`, `creation_ip`) VALUES(\''.$db->escape($username_hash).'\', \''.$db->escape($username).'\', \''.intval($pun_user['id']).'\', \''.md5($password1).'\', \''.time().'\', \''.get_remote_address().'\')') or error('Unable to fill players', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error()); $db->query('INSERT INTO '.$db->prefix."rscd_invitems(`user`, `id`, `amount`, `wielded`, `slot`) VALUES ('".$db->escape($username_hash)."', '10', '500', '0', '0') ") or error('Unable to fill curstats', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error()); $db->query('INSERT INTO '.$db->prefix."rscd_bank(`owner`, `id`, `amount`, `slot`) VALUES ('".$db->escape($pun_user['id'])."', '373', '70000', '1'), ('".$db->escape($pun_user['id'])."', '77', '1', '2'), ('".$db->escape($pun_user['id'])."', '316', '1', '3') ") or error('Unable to fill curstats', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error());

Just change id of items e.g ‘373’ amount ‘70000’ bank slot ‘1’ to whichever you like.

Read full topic
